source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a landscape scenery shot of a tranquil, snowy rural area in winter. The video lacks a single main subject, as the focus is on the expansive, wintry environment and the atmosphere of quiet isolation rather than a specific person or object. A vast, snow-covered field stretches across the foreground under a gray, overcast sky, with snowflakes visibly falling. In the mid-ground, a cluster of white, circular yurts with conical roofs sits near a traditional red wooden house and a few smaller sheds, all blanketed in snow. A dark, dense forest of evergreen trees lines a distant hill, completing the serene and cold winter tableau.
